app.title: Refactoring Racer
app.subtitle: Master Mac keyboard shortcuts through code challenges

start.description: Fix broken code using only keyboard shortcuts. No mouse or arrow keys allowed!
start.tip: Tip: Use Ctrl+Z to undo and Ctrl+Shift+Z to redo
start.difficultyHint: Leave unselected to include all difficulties
start.categoryHint: Leave unselected to include all categories
start.languageHint: Leave unselected to include all languages

game.instructions: Fix the code to match the goal

result.title: Results
result.noWeakKeys: Great job! No weak areas found.

problems.p1_desc: Add semicolons to the end of each statement.
problems.p2_desc: Delete the duplicate characters in the function.
problems.p4_desc: Remove extra whitespace in the code.
problems.p5_desc: Fix all issues in this messy function.
problems.t1_desc: Find and delete the duplicate letter.
problems.t2_desc: Add missing periods at the end of sentences.
problems.t4_desc: Remove extra spaces and add a period.

problems.t15_desc: Enhance simple descriptions with poetic language.
